entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
